text:
hey everyone. I was recently working on some transactional email templates an noticed that you can’t perform conditional logic in email templates. This is a pretty massive flaw and something that should really just work as you’d expect it to – or _at least_ throw up an error when attempting to do so.
More details can be found in the feature suggestion <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/HubSpot-Ideas/if-statements-in-email-templates/idi-p/282907>
Are there any plans to implement/support this in the near future, or at least improve the communication of the limitation when developing a template?
